column2: Hailing from the highest peaks of the World's Edge Mountains, Arabyans just like the northern Imperials are willing to pay vast sums of gold for a single egg or chick such the reknown of these majestic beasts.
Elephants are unstoppable beasts. Trained on the battlefield, they lead Araby's leaders to war, wiping out everything that gets in their way.

Hailing from the highest peaks of the World's Edge Mountains, Arabyans just like the northern Imperials are willing to pay vast sums of gold for a single egg or chick such the reknown of these majestic beasts.
Elephants are unstoppable beasts. Trained on the battlefield, they lead Araby's leaders to war, wiping out everything that gets in their way.
Some of the fastest and most furious breeds of horse come from the lands of Araby.
